Installation
------------

### Dependencies

cm-tpm requires:

- Python (>= 3.8)


### User installation

The easiest way to install cm-tpm is using ``pip``:
```
pip install cm-tpm
```
<!-- or using ``conda``:
```
conda install cm-tpm
``` -->

Also ensure that you have the necessary dependencies installed:
```
pip install numpy pandas scipy torch
```

<!-- After installation, you can check that ``cm-tpm`` is successfully installed by running:
```
cm-tpm --version
``` -->
